title: Alpine Corporation GRS122A-SLR Gazing Globe, 10" L x 10" W x 12" H with Stand: 17" H, Purple
features: OUTDOOR GARDEN DÉCOR: Gazing globe is powered by solar energy and made from multi-colored glass pieces, and provides a unique and decorative addition to your home's interior or exterior décor
ILLUMINATE YOUR GARDEN: Features 10 solar powered LED lights to keep your outdoor gazing ball lit up throughout the night for a bright, colorful display
STURDY AND SUPPORTIVE: Glass orb comes with a metal stand to securely hold the garden sphere, while providing a decorative addition to your garden, patio, or front door entryway

VIVID YARD DISPLAY: Add one or multiple glass orbs to enhance your garden's natural beauty with their electrifying colors and iridescent shine, and promotes a healthy garden by reflecting light creating beautiful patterns onto flat surfaces
description: Add beautiful, bright color to your yard with Alpine’s Outdoor Solar Powered Glass Mosaic Gazing Globe with LED Lights and Metal Stand. Made from different colored pieces of glass, this spherical yard art décor provides a unique and decorative addition to your home's exterior décor with its colorful, mosaic design. Featuring 10 solar powered LED lights, the solar energy keeps your outdoor gazing ball lit up throughout the night for a bright, colorful display. The multi-use glass gazing ball can be used in a variety of ways, including in your garden, patio, courtyard, or front door entryway. The glass orb comes with a durable metal stand made from weather-resistant iron to securely hold the garden sphere. Add one or multiple glass orbs to enhance your formal or informal garden's natural beauty with their electrifying colors and iridescent shine. This colored glass gazing ball will add vibrant color and shine to your garden, and will help promote a healthy garden by reflecting light on sunny days. This colorful glass gazing sphere measures 10"L x 10"W x 17"H to fit almost any outdoor area and includes a one year manufacturer. Alpine Corporation is one of America's leading designers, importers, and distributors of superior quality home and garden decor products. Alpine's award winning in-house design team continuously develops new and innovative "statements pieces" for your home and garden. Your outdoor living spaces will be the envy of the neighborhood with our wide assortment of fresh, fashionable and contemporary products, from beautifully crafted solar garden stakes featuring patented motion and fiber optic lighting technology to gorgeous glass and glow-in-the-dark bird baths and feeders.
